## @ebay/spellcaster-ebay

The client provide access to configuration of esams clients for the given app name

### Install

```bash
yarn add @ebay/spellcaster-ebay
```

### Usage

```js
const { getConfig } = require('@ebay/spellcaster-ebay');
const config = await getConfig();

cfg.isPatronusEnabled()
cfg.isFideliusEnabled()
cfg.isProtegoEnabled()
cfg.isPatronusFallbackEnabled()
cfg.isFideliusFallbackEnabled()
cfg.isProtegoFallbackEnabled()
```
